ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Rather he has brought the truth and confirmed the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Not in the least. He has brought the truth and confirmed the other messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (They say so although) he brought the Truth and confirmed the veracity of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In fact, he had brought them the truth and had acknowledged the Messengers (who were sent before him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In fact he has brought the Truth, and testified for the Noble Messengers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay! he has come with the truth and he confirms the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay: he has come with the truth and verified the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No indeed; but he brought the truth, and confirmed the Envoys.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but he brought the Truth, and he confirmed those sent (before him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, he has brought the truth, confirming those who were sent before;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Aye! he hath come with the truth, and he confesseth to the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, he has brought [them] the truth, and confirmed the [earlier] apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay! he has come with the (very) Truth, and he confirms (the Message of) the messengers (before him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay! he (Muhammad SAW) has come with the truth (i.e. Allah's Religion - Islamic Monotheism and this Quran) and he confirms the Messengers (before him who brought Allah's religion - Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No, indeed, he has brought the truth, and confirmed the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In fact, he came with the truth, and he confirmed the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Rather, the Prophet has come with the truth and confirmed the [previous] messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:37] God, exalted be He, says: Nay, but he has brought [them] the truth and confirmed the [earlier] messengers, namely, those who had also brought this [truth], which is that there is no god except God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but he) Muhammad (pbuh) (brought the Truth) he brought the Qur'an and the profession of Allah's divine Oneness, (and he confirmed those sent (before him)) and he brought a confirmation of the messengers who were sent before him.
